name: WebClock
body:
## WebClock
WebClock is a simple pure-JS clock widget that allows you to have a clock widget on your site or app.

### Installation

Method 1 Easier:
1. Use `script` tag and in the `src` attribute put the [link](http://riverajakob11.github.com/WebClock/src/webclock.js) of the file.

Method 2:
Download it.
[Download link](http://riverajakob11.github.com/WebClock/src/webclock.js)

### Support or Contact
Having problems? contact me at [jakobaindreas11@gmail.com](mailto:jakobaindreas11@gmail.com)
